title: ZEDNetwork
author: ZEDNetwork
content: Candle Labs (https://www.CandleLabs.org) has been running a successful bounty program for bounty hunters and developers. Rewards go as high as 500k CNDL (~$500) for beta testers who refer other beta testers and developers, upvote for integrations like debank and Zerion and test their new AMM DEX. They also have grants for developers who deploy DApps or tokens on Candle Chain (from 5M to 25M CNDL depending on the project).
